title: Honey Garlic Chicken Stir Fry
description: Tender chicken pieces coated in a sweet and savory honey garlic sauce with colorful vegetables. Perfect for busy weeknights.
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together honey, soy sauce, and rice vinegar. Set aside.
Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet or wok over high heat. Add chicken pieces in a single layer and cook until golden brown on all sides, about 5-6 minutes. Remove and set aside.
Add remaining oil to the pan. Stir fry broccoli and bell pepper for 2-3 minutes until crisp-tender.
Return chicken to the pan. Add minced garlic and cook for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Pour the honey garlic sauce over the chicken and vegetables. Stir to coat evenly.
Add the cornstarch slurry and stir until sauce thickens, about 1-2 minutes.
Serve immediately over steamed rice, garnished with sesame seeds.
